profile.name: Sebastián Ramírez
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at FastAPI Cloud | Docker Image Expert & Python Library Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a passion for building and maintaining Docker images for various web frameworks. Proven ability to adapt to new technologies and libraries, with a strong focus on open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at FastAPI Cloud
description: Led the development of Docker images for various web frameworks, resulting in improved deployment efficiency and scalability.
Collaborated with the FastAPI team to provide feedback and suggestions that contributed to the project's growth.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using Python, Docker, and various web frameworks.
Contributed to open-source projects like Typer, LibCST, and Pydantic.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects using Python and Docker.
Improved project documentation and contributed to community engagement.
